verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H5166>Nehemiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2446>Hachaliah<s%>. And it came to pass in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H3691>Chisleu<s%>, in the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, as I was in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> the <S%H1002>palace<s%>,

That <S%H2607>Hanani<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> of my <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H935>came<s%>, he and certain <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; and I <S%H7592>asked<s%> them concerning the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that had <S%H6413>escaped<s%>, which were <S%H7604>left<s%> of the <S%H7628>captivity<s%>, and concerning <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, The <S%H7604>remnant<s%> that are <S%H7604>left<s%> of the <S%H7628>captivity<s%> there in the <S%H4082>province<s%> are in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>affliction<s%> and <S%H2781>reproach<s%>: the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> also is broken <S%H6555>down<s%>, and the <S%H8179>gates<s%> thereof are <S%H3341>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And it came to pass, when I <S%H8085>heard<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%>, that I sat <S%H3427>down<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%>, and <S%H56>mourned<s%> certain <S%H3117>days<s%>, and <S%H6684>fasted<s%>, and <S%H6419>prayed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>,

And <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H577>beseech<s%> thee, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, the <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>, that <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>mercy<s%> for them that <S%H157>love<s%> him and <S%H8104>observe<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>:

Let thine <S%H241>ear<s%> now be <S%H7183>attentive<s%>, and thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%>, that thou mayest <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, which I <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee <S%H3117>now<s%>, <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%>, for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and <S%H3034>confess<s%> the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee: both I and my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>.

We have dealt <S%H2254>very<s%> <S%H2254>corruptly<s%> against thee, and have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, nor the <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, nor the <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, which thou <S%H6680>commandedst<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

<S%H2142>Remember<s%>, I beseech thee, the <S%H1697>word<s%> that thou <S%H6680>commandedst<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, If ye <S%H4603>transgress<s%>, I will scatter you <S%H6327>abroad<s%> among the <S%H5971>nations<s%>:

But if ye <S%H7725>turn<s%> unto me, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> them; though there were of you cast <S%H5080>out<s%> unto the uttermost <S%H7097>part<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, yet will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> them from thence, and will <S%H935>bring<s%> them unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> that I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> to <S%H7931>set<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> there.

Now these are thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> and thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, whom thou hast <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> by thy <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%>, and by thy <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, I <S%H577>beseech<s%> thee, let now thine <S%H241>ear<s%> be <S%H7183>attentive<s%> to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, who <S%H2655>desire<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>: and <S%H6743>prosper<s%>, I pray thee, thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H5414>grant<s%> him <S%H7356>mercy<s%> in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of this <S%H376>man<s%>. For I was the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H8248>cupbearer<s%>.
